plot: Kim Do-hyun (Jang Hyuk), smart and ambitious lawyer, was in relationship with Lee Jung-yeon (Lee Min-jung). The peaceful relationship soon ran into problem when Do-hyun was lured into the world of hedge fund and money greed.
plot_en: Kim Do-hyun (Jang Hyuk), smart and ambitious lawyer, was in relationship with Lee Jung-yeon (Lee Min-jung). The peaceful relationship soon ran into problem when Do-hyun was lured into the world of hedge fund and money greed.

title: Midas
